item.title: Need help with quest cape
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

Lmfao i made a code for my friend with this purpose let me remember it.

This code isnt complete, but it should work, btw put me in the credits like 1% for this code.

[code]
if(wearID == 2740 && q1 != 15 && q2 != 15 && q3 != 15 && q4 != 15 && q5 != 15 && q6 != 15 && q7 !=15 && q8 != 15 && q9 != 15 && q10 != 15 && q11 !=15){
sM(“Congratulations you are worthy enough to wear this cape!”);
} else {
if(wearID == 2740 && (q1 != 1 || q2 != 1 || q3 != 1 || q4 != 1 || q5 != 1 || q6 != 1 || q7 != 1 || q8 != 1 || q9 != 1 || q10 != 1 || q11 != 1)){
sM(“You Need To Have All Quests Complete”)
deleteItem(2470, 1); // When the player wears the skillcape its deletes it from him so he cant equipt
addItem(2470, 1); // adds the skillcape to his inv
